title: Mortgage indemnity insurance (lender's mortgage insurance)
dataVerified: Lender, borrower, property address, loan-to-value, coverage amount
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Shows the issuer domain and the responder text (e.g., "Valid ID" or "Denied").
rationale: Prevents fake mortgage indemnity insurance. Domain binding verifies mortgage insurer (Genworth, MGIC, Radian). High LTV loans (>80%). Lender protection from borrower default. Housing crisis losses ($50bn 2008-2012).
